unit.decl_stmt:

.name = "pp7",
.description = NULL_IF_CONFIG_SMALL("Apply Postprocessing 7 filter."),
.priv_size = sizeof(PP7Context),

.inputs = pp7_inputs,
.outputs = pp7_outputs,
.priv_class = &pp7_class,
.flags = AVFILTER_FLAG_SUPPORT_TIMELINE_INTERNAL,
